CONDITIONAL SALE, MORTGAGE OR OTHER ENCUMBRANCE THE NAMED INSURED IS THE SOLE OWNER OF THE AUTOMOBILE, EXCEPT AS HEREIN STATED USED JUNE 1946 1395 is not required by or and principal VI THE INSURANCE AFFORDED IS ONLY WITH RESPECT TO SUCH AND so MANY OF THE FOLLOWING COVERAGES AS ARE INDICATED BY SPECIFIC PREMIUM CHARGE OR CHARGES. THE LIMIT OF THE COMPANY'S LIABILITY AGAINST EACH SUCH COVER. AGE SHALL BE AS STATED HEREIN, SUBJECT TO ALL OF THE TERMS OF THE POLICY HAVING REFERENCE.THERETO.
